info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elbert County through 1145 PM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elberton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Nancy Hart State Park, Bobby Brown State Park, Middleton, Russell State Park, Lake Strom Thurmond, Lake Russell, Fortsonia, Sweet City and Rice Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
